snippet.title: Savior Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The first trailer for our action adventure game, Savior. Explore the lost world of Arcadia in a quest to rebuild a desperately divided civilization.
Wishlist Savior on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1093810/Savior/
Find out more at http://www.saviorgame.com
See detailed project updates at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/starsoft/savior-4/posts

Get the first news on the project and help us get this thing done by backing Savior on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/starsoft

Music by Benedict Nichols: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCklqpiLcz_LbV1RWETkqrdQ

Concept art, editing and additional direction by Robert Borth:
https://www.vimeo.com/rborth
